said: Ma pateesa mi yatuka noleeya myo newpa bunky dunko.
Sorry, hair ball.  What do you want?
My friend is sick.  He needs octopus juice or something.  To be honest, I forgot what the plot was supposed to be.
Oh, Johnny?  Yeah, he lost to me in a saucer chugging contest.  What a newb.  I have your juice, here.
